Serialized Form

  • Package project.graphics

    • Class project.graphics.ComputerSystemPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • xMax

          int xMax
          Maximum X coordinate.

        • yMax

          int yMax
          Maximum Y coordinate.

        • current

          SystemNode current
          A pointer of the current selected node.

        • startNode

          SystemNode startNode
          This pointer is used when new system link is created. It points to the first node of the system link.

        • endNode

          SystemNode endNode
          This pointer is used when new system link is created. It points to the second node of the system link.

        • currentTr

          SystemLink currentTr
          A pointer of the current selected system link.

        • newSystemNode

          javax.swing.JToggleButton newSystemNode
          This toggle button is used to create new system nodes. When this button is toggled it is possible to create new node on the workspace by simply clicking on it once.

        • newSystemLink

          javax.swing.JToggleButton newSystemLink
          This toggle button is used to create new system links. When this button is toggled it is possible to create new system link in two steps: first, click to the first node, then just click to the node you want to connect with the first one.

        • delete

          javax.swing.JToggleButton delete
          This toggle button is used to delete graph elements.

        • clear

          javax.swing.JButton clear
          This toggle button is used to clear all the elements on the workspace.

        • checkConnectivity

          javax.swing.JButton checkConnectivity
          This button is used to check the connectivity of the computer system graph.

        • linksNumber

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> linksNumber
          A component to specify physical links of the computer system nodes.

        • duplexBox

          javax.swing.JCheckBox duplexBox
          A component to set on/off duplex property of the physical links.

        • save

          javax.swing.JButton save
          This button is used to save computer system graph to the file.

        • open

          javax.swing.JButton open
          This button is used to open existing computer system graph file.

        • nodePopup

          javax.swing.JPopupMenu nodePopup
          A popup menu that contains an option to change index of the system node.

        • computerSystem

          ComputerSystem computerSystem
          This is the object of the computer system.

        • nodeList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> nodeList
          A list which contains nodes of the computer system.

        • linkList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> linkList
          A list which contains system links of the system.

    • Class project.graphics.ConsolePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • console

          javax.swing.JTextArea console
          Text area object.

    • Class project.graphics.GraphGeneratorPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • inputPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel inputPanel
          A panel, which contains input fields of the parameters.

        • randomGraphPanel

          RandomGraphPanel randomGraphPanel
          A pointer to the panel, which graphically displays generated graph.

        • consolePanel

          ConsolePanel consolePanel
          A pointer to the console panel.

        • single

          javax.swing.JCheckBox single
          This check box specifies whether we generate single graph or multiple

        • generate

          javax.swing.JButton generate
          Generation button.

        • graphGenerator

          GraphGenerator graphGenerator
          A pointer to the object of graph generator, which contains all the logic of the graphs generation.

        • fields

          java.util.ArrayList<E> fields
          A list to store all the input fields of the parameters.

        • labels

          java.util.ArrayList<E> labels
          A list to store all the labels of the input fields.

        • computerSystemPanel

          ComputerSystemPanel computerSystemPanel
          A pointer to the computer system panel.

    • Class project.graphics.GraphPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • graph

          Graph graph
          A pointer to the graph object, which contains all the logic.

        • csPanel

          ComputerSystemPanel csPanel
          A pointer to the computer system panel.

        • schedulePanel

          SchedulePanel schedulePanel
          A pointer to the schedule panel.

        • gnodesList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> gnodesList
          A list of the nodes of the graph.

        • trsList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> trsList
          A list of the transitions between graph nodes.

        • current

          GNode current
          A pointer to the current selected node.

        • startNode

          GNode startNode
          This pointer is used when new graph transition is created. It points to the first node of the transition.

        • endNode

          GNode endNode
          This pointer is used when new transition is created. It points to the second node of the transition.

        • currentTr

          GLink currentTr
          A pointer to the current selected transition.

        • newGNode

          javax.swing.JToggleButton newGNode
          This toggle button is used to create new graph node.

        • newTransition

          javax.swing.JToggleButton newTransition
          This toggle button is used to create new transition.

        • delete

          javax.swing.JToggleButton delete
          This toggle button is used to delete graph elements.

        • clear

          javax.swing.JButton clear
          A button to clear all the elements on the workspace.

        • checkCycles

          javax.swing.JButton checkCycles
          A button to check cycles in the graph.

        • generateQueues

          javax.swing.JButton generateQueues
          This button is used to generate queues.

        • queueType

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> queueType
          A component to specify queue type to generate.

        • loadTaskGraph

          javax.swing.JButton loadTaskGraph
          A button to load task graph on the computer system.

        • assignAlgorithm

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> assignAlgorithm
          This combo box is used to specify assign algorithm.

        • save

          javax.swing.JButton save
          This button is used to save task graph to file.

        • open

          javax.swing.JButton open
          This button is used to open existing task graph.

        • nodePopup

          javax.swing.JPopupMenu nodePopup
          This popup menu contains options to change node's index or execution time. parameters

        • transPopup

          javax.swing.JPopupMenu transPopup
          This popup menu contains an option to change transition's amount of data.

        • graphPanel

    • Class project.graphics.RandomGraphPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • xMax

          int xMax
          Maximum X coordinate.

        • yMax

          int yMax
          Maximum Y coordinate.

        • centerX

          double centerX
          X coordinate of the center of the component.

        • centerY

          double centerY
          Y coordinate of the center of the component.

        • R

          double R
          On this panel graph nodes locate on the circle. This field contains the value of the circle radius.

        • alpha

          double alpha
          An auxiliary angle to locate graph nodes on the circle.

        • gnodeList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> gnodeList
          List of the graph nodes.

        • linkList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> linkList
          List of the graph transitions.

    • Class project.graphics.SchedulePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • xMax

          int xMax
          Maximum X coordinate.

        • yMax

          int yMax
          Maximum Y coordinate.

        • N

          int N
          Number of the nodes of the computer system.

        • maxTactNumber

          int maxTactNumber
          Maximum tact number. It can be calculated by adding execution time value of each node of the task graph.

        • nodeSectionHeight

          double nodeSectionHeight
          This value specifies the height of each computer system node section.

        • tactHeight

          double tactHeight
          This value specifies the height of the schedule diagram bars.

        • tactWidth

          double tactWidth
          The width of the single tact.

        • startLine

          java.awt.geom.Line2D startLine
          Start of the coordinates.

        • systemNodesList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> systemNodesList
          List of the computer system nodes.

  • Package project.logic

    • Class project.logic.DataTransmission extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • startTime

          int startTime
          Start time of transmission(in tacts)

        • endTime

          int endTime
          End time of transmission(in tacts)

        • transmissionTime

          int transmissionTime
          Transmission total time(in tacts)

        • srcGNode

          GNode srcGNode
          Source task graph node.

        • destGNode

          GNode destGNode
          Destination task graph node.

        • srcSystemNode

          SystemNode srcSystemNode
          Source system node.

        • destSystemNode

          SystemNode destSystemNode
          Destination system node.

        • srcSystemNodeLinkNum

          int srcSystemNodeLinkNum
          Number of physical links of the source system node

        • destSystemNodeLinkNum

          int destSystemNodeLinkNum
          Number of physical links of the destination system node

    • Class project.logic.GLink extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • startGNode

          GNode startGNode
          Source graph node.

        • endGNode

          GNode endGNode
          Destination graph node.

        • cx

          double cx
          Center X coordinate of the transition link on the workspace.

        • cy

          double cy
          Center Y coordinate of the transition link on the workspace.

        • arrowSize

          double arrowSize
          Arrow is a graphical component of the transition, it specifies the direction of the transition. This field contains the length value of the arrow side.

        • arrowAngle

          double arrowAngle
          Angle of the arrow relatively to the transition line.

        • beta

          double beta
          Auxiliary angle.

        • line

          java.awt.geom.Line2D line
          Transition line.

        • tCom

          int tCom
          Transition communication time. It's an abstract value of the amount of transmitted data.

        • message

          java.lang.String message
          Communication time string. It is displayed in the center of the transition line.

        • time

          java.util.ArrayList<E> time

    • Class project.logic.GNode extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • index

          int index
          Unique graph node index

        • indexStr

          java.lang.String indexStr
          Graph node index string. It is used to display index in the top side of the graph node circle.

        • tExe

          int tExe
          Execution time of the node.

        • tExeStr

          java.lang.String tExeStr
          Execution time string. It is used to display time in the bottom side of the graph node circle.

        • assigned

          boolean assigned
          Assigning flag.

        • cyclesCheckCode

          int cyclesCheckCode
          Cycles check code.

        • cpTime

          int cpTime
          Critical path time of the node. It's the time of the longest path from this node to the end of the task graph.

        • cpGNodeNumber

          int cpGNodeNumber
          Critical path graph node number.

        • priority

          double priority
          Priority of the node.

        • startTime

          int startTime
          Grpah node start time(in tacts).

        • endTime

          int endTime
          Grpah node end time(in tacts).

        • cx

          double cx
          Center X coordinate of the node.

        • cy

          double cy
          Center Y coordinate of the node.

        • color

          java.awt.Color color
          Default color of the node.

        • gnode

          java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D gnode
          Basic circle of the graph node.

        • next

          java.util.ArrayList<E> next
          This list contains successors of this graph node.

        • prev

          java.util.ArrayList<E> prev
          This list contains ancestry of this graph node.

        • routes

          java.util.ArrayList<E> routes
          This list stores different routes(depending on queue type) of this graph node.

        • assignedSystemNode

          SystemNode assignedSystemNode
          Specifies computer system node to which this graph node is assigned.

    • Class project.logic.ProcessorLink extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • linkNumber

          int linkNumber
          Number of physical link.

        • scheduledTransmissions

          java.util.ArrayList<E> scheduledTransmissions
          A list of scheduled to this link transmissions.

    • Class project.logic.SystemLink extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • firstNode

          SystemNode firstNode
          First system node.

        • secondNode

          SystemNode secondNode
          Second system node.

        • line

          java.awt.geom.Line2D line
          Line, which represents this connection graphically on the workspace.

    • Class project.logic.SystemNode extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • index

          int index
          Unique system node index.

        • indexStr

          java.lang.String indexStr
          Index string.

        • priority

          int priority
          System node priority. The greater nodes coherence, the more priority it has.

        • scheduledNodes

          java.util.ArrayList<E> scheduledNodes
          A list of scheduled graph nodes.

        • processorLinks

          java.util.ArrayList<E> processorLinks
          A list of system node physical links.

        • tacts

          java.util.ArrayList<E> tacts
          A list of tacts for this node.

        • totalTime

          int totalTime
          Total scheduling time(i.e. last scheduled task/transmission).

        • color

          java.awt.Color color
          Color to display on the workspace

        • systemNode

          java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D systemNode
          Basic rectangle for graphical representation.

        • prev

          SystemNode prev
          A pointer to prev system node. It is used when we generate reverse path.

        • neighbours

          java.util.ArrayList<E> neighbours
          A list of system node "neighbours" (nodes that are connected to this node).

        • used

          boolean used
          This flag is used for breadth-first search in the system nodes graph.

        • cx

          double cx
          Center X coordinate of the system node rectangle.

        • cy

          double cy
          Center Y coordinate of the system node rectangle.

    • Class project.logic.Tact extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • tactNum

          int tactNum
          Tact number.

        • sysNode

          SystemNode sysNode
          Computer system node.

        • scheduledGNode

          GNode scheduledGNode
          Scheduled graph node.

        • scheduledTransmissions

          DataTransmission[] scheduledTransmissions
          Scheduled transmissions for each physical link of processor.

        • procLinkIsBusy

          boolean[] procLinkIsBusy
          Array of links state flags.

        • inOut

          int[] inOut
          This value specifies the direction of data transmission. It is used for duplex links only.
